fields.label: General
fields.description: Core settings, operating hours, and operator assignments

fields.label: Enable Chat
fields.description: Toggle the entire chat widget on or off

fields.label: Start Time
fields.description: When operators are available (00:00 = always)

fields.label: End Time
fields.description: When operators go offline (00:00 = always)

fields.label: Chat Operators
fields.description: Users who can respond to incoming chats

fields.label: Branding
fields.description: Brand identity and welcome screen text

fields.label: Brand Name
fields.description: Company or product name shown in the widget

fields.label: Brand Logo
fields.description: Logo displayed at the top of the welcome screen

fields.label: Primary Color
fields.description: Chat bubble, message bubbles, and accent elements

fields.label: Button Color
fields.description: Used for CTA buttons (Start Chat, Send Message). Falls back to Primary Color if empty.

fields.label: Welcome Title
fields.description: Main heading on the welcome screen

fields.label: Welcome Subtitle
fields.description: Secondary text below the title

fields.label: Online Status Text
fields.description: Shown when chat is within operating hours

fields.label: Offline Status Text
fields.description: Shown when chat is outside operating hours

fields.label: CTA & Widget
fields.description: Configure the main call-to-action button and the floating chat bubble

fields.label: CTA Button Label
fields.description: Text on the main action button (e.g. Chat with us Here)

fields.label: CTA Button Effect
fields.description: Glow = pulsing shadow, Levitate = floating motion, Pulse = scale breathing, Bounce = gentle bounce

fields.label: Bubble Style
fields.description: Icon Only = clean circle; Icon + Label = pill with text

fields.label: Bubble Icon
fields.description: Icon displayed on the floating chat bubble

fields.label: Bubble Label
fields.description: Text next to the icon (visible only when Bubble Style is Icon + Label)

fields.label: Appearance
fields.description: Badge, footer, and other visual elements

fields.label: Show 24/7 Badge
fields.description: Display a diagonal ribbon badge on the welcome screen

fields.label: Badge Text
fields.description: Text shown in the ribbon (e.g. 24/7, Mon-Fri)

fields.label: Footer Text
fields.description: Shown at the bottom of the welcome screen

fields.label: Footer Link
fields.description: URL the footer text links to

fields.label: Contact Channels
fields.description: Direct contact methods shown on the welcome screen

fields.label: Phone Number
fields.description: Direct call number e.g. +251978077878

fields.label: WhatsApp Number
fields.description: International format e.g. +251978077878

fields.label: Telegram Link
fields.description: e.g. https://t.me/addisfly

fields.label: Company Email
fields.description: Included in the downloadable vCard

fields.label: Company Address
fields.description: Used in the downloadable vCard

fields.label: Enable Save Contact
fields.description: Show the Save to Contact card on the welcome screen

fields.label: Save to Contact (vCard)
fields.description: Configure the downloadable contact card. Phone, email, address, WhatsApp, Telegram, and social links are pulled from the sections above.

fields.label: Contact Display Name
fields.description: Full name shown in the contact card (e.g. AddisFly | Customer Service). Falls back to Brand Name.

fields.label: Organization
fields.description: Company name in the vCard (e.g. AddisFly). Falls back to Brand Name.

fields.label: Job Title
fields.description: Role or department (e.g. Customer Service, Sales Team)

fields.label: Contact Photo
fields.description: Square image for the contact card. If empty, Brand Logo is used.

fields.label: Website URL
fields.description: e.g. https://addisfly.com — added to the vCard

fields.label: Contact Note
fields.description: Optional note included in the vCard (e.g. Your wings to the world)

fields.label: Social Links
fields.description: Social media profiles (shown as icons on the welcome screen)

fields.label: Instagram URL
fields.description: e.g. https://instagram.com/addisfly

fields.label: TikTok URL
fields.description: e.g. https://tiktok.com/@addisfly

fields.label: LinkedIn URL
fields.description: e.g. https://linkedin.com/company/addisfly

fields.label: Facebook URL
fields.description: e.g. https://facebook.com/addisfly

fields.label: Telegram Channel URL
fields.description: Content/news channel (separate from support Telegram)
Reserved for future use — comma-separated order of channel icons
fields.label: Channel Icons Order
AI Assistant
fields.description: Configure the AI-powered auto-reply for guests and draft suggestions for agents
